channel.title: round-ups on Wildlife Afield Index
channel.description: Recent content in round-ups on Wildlife Afield Index

item.title: British Columbia Round-Up
item.description: Field Notes and Caring People Wildlife dramas and unusual behaviours that are witnessed in the field are unique and of interest to others. It is a privilege to see such events and it is important to document what has been observed. The information is stored in our databases and over time contributes to the natural history and understanding of animals in the province. On occasion, animals also need our help, either directly or passively, through conservation or aid efforts.
